adjectives.description: martyrly (comparative more martyrly, superlative most martyrly)

adverbs.description: martyrly (comparative more martyrly, superlative most martyrly)

entries.meaning: (obsolete, rare) In a way which befits or suggests a martyr.
examples: they tell me 't were in vain to try, / And that the Edinburgh Review and Quarterly / Treat a dissenting author very martyrly.
